snippet: A man who accused singer Chris Brown and his bodyguard of breaking his nose testified on Thursday that the R&B artist punched him because he did not want to pose for a photo....

headline.print_headline: Singer Chris Brown's Bodyguard on Trial for Assault
headline.main: Singer Chris Brown's Bodyguard on Trial for Assault

lead_paragraph: A man who accused singer Chris Brown and his bodyguard of breaking his nose testified on Thursday that the R&B artist punched him because he did not want to pose for a photo.
